description: The year 2001 was a time of significant change across various fields including technology, culture, and geopolitics. Major events shaped the future in unexpected ways, and the world saw the rise of the internet as a pivotal force in global communication. In this presentation, we reflect on key moments from 2001 that altered the course of history. Each slide explores a specific aspect of that year and its impact.
